text: Saeid Ghalandari (, born 17 February 1990) is an Iranian futsal player. He is currently a member of Sohan Mohammad Sima in the Iranian Futsal Super League. ==Club career== ===Atoliyeh Tehran Qom=== He scored his first goal in the Iranian Futsal Super League in a 4–2 win over Farsh Ara Mashhad. == Honours == * Iran Futsal's 1st Division ** Runners-up (1): 2016–17 (Atoliyeh Tehran Qom) == References == Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:People from Qom Category:Iranian men's futsal players Category:Futsal forwards Category:Sohan Mohammad Sima FSC players
title: Saeid Ghalandari
